title: Bloomberg Markets: Bittles on Narrow Leadership in Stocks
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bittles on Narrow Leadership in Stocks
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Bruce Bittles Chief Investment Strategist Baird Discussing concern that only a small group of stocks representing slightly more than 1.0% of the S&P 500 have a weighting of more than 13%.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
